div.p: DESPISED WAS DESPERATION. FINALLY TONIGHT, THE TIP OF THE
DAY. LAST NIGHT DURING MY DISCUSSION
WITH JAMES CARVIL I SAID THERE WERE NO REPUBLICAN SPEAKERS
SOME WERE ASKED TO SPEAK AND THEY DECLINED.
THEY SHOULD HAVE SPOKEN. THE MISTAKE ENTIRELY ON ME.
I SIMPLY ASSUMED SINCE ALL THE SPEAKERS WERE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS
THAT THE REPUBLICANS WERE LEFT OUT.
AND WHEN YOU MAKE A MISTAKE ADMIT IT.
I'M SORRY. I KNOW YOU WATCH THE FACTOR FOR
ACCURACY. THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE WEBSITE. WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF
